message:
A lot of people do block on HttpClient asynchronous methods, in a way that can cause deadlocks without ConfigureAwait: [http://blog.stephencleary.com/2012/07/dont-block-on-async-code.html](http://blog.stephencleary.com/2012/07/dont-block-on-async-code.html)

As a general rule, ConfigureAwait(false) should be used in library code.
